name: Skeleton Dungeon (Helmius)
description:
Skeleton Dungeon is an endless vertical-scrolling platformer for Android. The purpose of the game is to guide a skeleton trapped inside a sinking dungeon to jump as high as possible without falling while avoiding traps. How high can you get?

A simple and addictive game made by a bored developer stuck in quarantine.

Controls:

•Tilt to move your skeleton left and right, tap the screen to make him jump

Current features:

•Coins to collect

•Multiple platforms to jump on (Normal, moving, rotating, & falling)

•Online leaderboard

•Traps to avoid

•Unlockable power-ups (HP Up & Double Jump)

Will be implemented in next update:

•Enemies & Bosses

•More traps & platform
